customer_name: RESEARCH INSTITUTE AT NATIONWIDE CHILDRENS HO

citations.narrative:
A review of IACUC approved protocol AR18-00039 found that it included feeding pigs a special diet and supplement
aimed at producing disease states necessary for the study (metabolic syndrome, atherosclerosis and prearterial plaques
with calcification). This exception to the AWA standard of feeding was not reported as part of the exceptions to the
standards and regulations included with the facility's Fiscal Year 2022 Annual Report submitted to USDA Animal Care.
To assure that the facility is adhering to the standards and regulations under the Animal Welfare Act it must include a
summary of all exceptions specified and explained by the principal investigator and approved by the IACUC. The facility
shall ensure that a summary of all such exceptions are attached to the facility's FY 2022 Annual Report by submitting a
revised summary to USDA. Correct by Aug. 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, facility representatives and IACUC
representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Lauren Murphy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
